title: WTB: T3 Turkey Red Evers card

posts.post_title: WTB: T3 Turkey Red Evers card
posts.post_content:
Hello,

I am looking to purchase a nice mid-grade copy of a T3 Turkey Red #16 Johnny Evers card: VG-EX, VG-EX+, or EX.  Professionally graded or raw.

Please let me know and be able to provide pictures.

Thank you for your help!
Scott
